title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.7 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.7 - Records

State Regulations

The aircraft log, in addition to what is required by federal law or regulation, shall show for every passenger the point of origin and destination, and the time of departure and arrival. A file shall also be maintained which shall show the reason for each flight for each passenger. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
85.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
